ack.title: Authors’ contributions
ack.p: HCW planned and designed the research. YHK formulated the process and conducted the simulation. The manuscript was written from the contribution of the authors. Both authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Competing interests
sec.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: All data generated or analyzed during this study are included in this published article and its additional file.

sec.title: Ethics approval and consent to participate
Funding
sec.p: This work was conducted with financial support from the Basic Research Program (2017R1E1A01074445) through the National Research Foundation of Korea and from the Korea Institute of Energy Technology Evaluation and Planning (20194010201840).
